## Delivery Contract Pre-Flight
- [ ] Scope is explicit (what is in/out for this PR)
- [ ] Acceptance criteria are clear and testable
- [ ] Linked issue contains goal + DoD
- [ ] Docs impact is identified and handled

Reference: `docs/confluence/70-DELIVERY-CONTRACT.md`

## Summary
What changed and why?

## Linked Issue
Closes #

## Change Type
- [ ] Feature
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] Refactor
- [ ] Docs
- [ ] Test
- [ ] CI/CD

## Verification
- [ ] Lint/typecheck passed
- [ ] Tests passed
- [ ] Manual validation done

## Risks
Any known risk, migration, or rollback concern?

## Documentation
- [ ] README updated (if needed)
- [ ] WORKLOG updated
- [ ] SDLC/CONTRIBUTING updated (if needed)
